Class GameLogger

java.lang.Object
com.comp3607.logger.GameLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObserver
public class GameLogger extends Object implements GameObserver
Logs game events and generates reports in various formats

      public void update(String message)
      Updates the logger with a new message
      Specified by:
      update in interface GameObserver
      Parameters:
      message - the message to log

    • logTurn

      public void logTurn(Player player, String activity, Question question, String answerGiven, String result)
      Logs a player's turn with all relevant details
      Parameters:
      player - the player taking the turn
      activity - the activity performed
      question - the question involved in the turn
      answerGiven - the answer provided by the player
      result - the result of the answer check
